__e: And it doesn't make any sense to try to figure out why these things happen.
I can tell you this much. I've been trying for years just to see the Venable lawyers.
I loved her, and she was everything you could never be but insist on trying to be.
You call them in vain, your hired assassins are not here
It's as if my marriage hadn't been wasted, as if I'd had a son growing up for me.
In vain she was telling herself, that it would be madness.
I'd like to warn you for some reasons, but I know the futility of such an action and how he who warns is detested by him who loves unfortunately.
Otherwise it'd be like a movie with no point and no happy ending.
She waited longer than most women would wait. She thought you were dead.
